meaningMnemonic: This is a combination of the words 透ける and 通る. Something that is transparent enough for things (like light) to pass through it is still going <vocabulary>to be transparent</vocabulary>, aka <vocabulary>to be see-through</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The readings for this word are both kun'yomi readings. You've learned both of these readings by now so you should be able to read this on your own.
